name: God of the Arena Dungeon Demo
name_original: God of the Arena Dungeon Demo
description:
-THIS IS A SINGLEPLAYER DEMO OF THE BETA-
-JOIN THE DISCORD TO PLAY THE ONLINE BETA-
https://discord.gg/dsNAkTx or pm GAS God VII#9382 !

GotAD is a PvPvE arena twin-stick shooter heavily inspired by other successful browser games of the recent past. GotAD is built from the ground up with quick, hop-in-and-out gameplay in mind. For this reason, one will ideally be able to play GotAD in browser or on other accessible clients. 

  1. Hectic PvPvE with unique non-instanced dungeon bosses
  2. Extensive class tree system culminating in 16 different endgame classes
  3. Boasts team modes with unique class interaction
  4. Items and specializations allow for build customization
  5. Ever-expanding maps and game modes
  6. Made with both casual play and competitive play in mind

Destroy arena vermin, level up, choose your class path, get loot, and slay other players. Destroy the bosses of the arena without being slain, and perhaps your ascent into arena God-hood will be recorded into legend!

Controls:
Hold LMB : Shoot
RMB : Ability 1
SPACE : Ability 2
W, A, S, D : Move
Hold Q or SHIFT : Inspect HUD elements
E : Pick up item
Mouseover item : Inspect item
M : Toggle mini map
Enter : Chat
T : Team chat
F11 : Toggle full screen

Singleplayer Beta Demo
This is the beta build of the game as of September 7th 2020. Most mechanics, art, sounds, etc. are subject to change while approaching official release.

Want to play the private beta online?
join us at https://discord.gg/dsNAkTx or pm GAS God VII#9382 !
